title: Kasol - parvati valley - Solo Traveler - Suggestions pls.
text: Hello I am travelling solo to Kasol and around, in last week of September for approx 11-12 days Tentative plan: Malana  rasol  Tosh  Kheerganga Pulga -Kasol Kindly suggest: - If this plan is possible and covers most of the places there and if any place I have missed and should be added? - **Pls. suggest some reasonable and decent Hotel/Guest house/Hostel in kasol. Malana, Tosh, kheerganga etc, as I am a solo Traveller I am looking for place where I can find people and make friends. (Do give ph no. of stay if you have)**  Is it advisable to stay in Kasol or Chalal? Pls. Recommend hotel/guest house  Have heard the there is a guest house on hill top in Malana from where you have a Aerial view of malana or any other recommend guest house in Malana? - How will be the weather in Second half of Sept ... as in temperature wise and is it advisable to travel and trek? - Any Suggestions you would like to give to make the trip more adventurous and Fun. Hope to receive replies ASAP from fellow wanderers like me. Thanks in advance
